headline.main: Darlan Held Justified; Possible Reasons Advanced for Actions at Vichy and in Africa

lead_paragraph: The classification of Admiral Darlan as an opportunist is too simple. His classification as a Fascist is likewise too simple. We must give to France and Frenchmen the same motivation that inspires patriots everywhere, be they the "men of Vichy," de Gaullists, English or American.
